definition: to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: All the lamps were soft and misty and made a very tiny circle of light.
sentences.chinese: 所有的落地灯都只有一小圈柔和模糊的光。

sentences.english: If use marble lamp or floor lamp, the effect will be better.
sentences.chinese: 如使用云石灯或落地灯，效果会更好。

sentences.english: The fortuny floor lamp is from design within reach.
sentences.chinese: 落地灯是由可以实现的设计图设计的。

sentences.english: The other a side of the bed is putting one person's much taller floor lamp .
sentences.chinese: 床的另一侧摆放着一人多高的落地灯。

sentences.english: Clever floor lamp designed for the fans of the risks and thrills.
sentences.chinese: 为喜欢探险和刺激的人而设计的灵巧落地灯。

sentences.english: The special purpose of floor lamp?
I find that shape is an important feature in floor lamps.
sentences.chinese: 我发现落地灯的形状很重要。

definition: cover of lamp/lampshade/glass cover of oil lamp
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
